text: mariyu varu tama tandri ajna prakaram (a nagaranlo ververu dvarala gunda) pravesincaru. Adi kevalam ya'akhub manas'suloni korikanu purti ceyataniki matrame, kani allah sankalpam nundi tappincukovataniki, variki e matramu paniki raledu. Memu ataniki nerpina jnanam prakaram atanu jnanavantude kani cala mandiki teliyadu
